27  class io_context;

40 class FlowController
41 {
42  public:
44  static void NotifyControllersChangeSent(CacheChange_t*);
45 
47  virtual void operator()(std::vector<CacheChange_t*>& changes) = 0;
48 
49  virtual ~FlowController();
50  FlowController();
51 
52  private:
53  virtual void NotifyChangeSent(CacheChange_t*){};
54  void RegisterAsListeningController();
55  void DeRegisterAsListeningController();
56 
57  static std::vector<FlowController*> ListeningControllers;
58  static std::unique_ptr<std::thread> ControllerThread;
59  static void StartControllerService();
60  static void StopControllerService();
61 
62  // No copy, assignment or move! Controllers are accessed by reference
63  // from several places.
64  // Ownership to be transferred via unique_ptr move semantics only.
65  const FlowController& operator=(const FlowController&) = delete;
66  FlowController(const FlowController&) = delete;
67  FlowController(FlowController&&) = delete;
68 
69  protected:
70  static std::recursive_mutex FlowControllerMutex;
71  static std::unique_ptr<asio::io_service> ControllerService;
72 
73  public:
74  // To be used by derived filters to schedule asynchronous operations.
75  static bool IsListening(FlowController*);
76 };
77 
78 } // namespace rtps
79 } // namespace fastrtps
80 } // namespace eprosima
